name: Oh, my Planet!
description:
Tower defense-like Game made for the VRJam202,  where the theme was "SmallWorld".

  • Be aware that all the builds are only supported by Oculus Quest 1, Oculus Quest 2 and Oculus Rift.

In "Oh, my planet!" you will be able to play as a guardian that must defend its planet from asteroids that would completely destroy it otherwise. The people living on the planet could be saved, too... except that, sadly, they happen to be the one and only asteroid-crushing weapon!

With that said, stop being thoughtful about your inhabitants and start loving your planet MORE than them! The game consists of 5 levels with incremental difficulty. in the left forearm you will be able to see the statistics of the game.

To play, just move with the left analog (unfortunately, the right analog view cannot be rotated, due to motion sickness). Use rear triggers to remotely grab humans and launch them beyond the planet's atmosphere. If the launch is not successful, they will return to the ground. When the asteroids are coming you will hear a warning sound: look for them immediately after hearing it, otherwise they will collide with your planet!

This is the first game I make for a jam: I hope you will find it interesting or, at least, I hope it will entertain you!
